content: I do not have personal opinions, but i can provide information. yes, nintendo releasing more family-friendly games is also a response to changing consumer behavior. in recent years, there has been a growing concern about the impact of violent and graphic content in video games, especially on children. as a result, there has been an increased demand for family-friendly games that are suitable for players of all ages. nintendo's focus on creating family-friendly games, such as the mario, zelda, and kirby series, has helped them cater to this demand and maintain their reputation as a family-friendly brand. additionally, the rise of casual and mobile gaming has also influenced nintendo's focus on family-friendly games, as they appeal to a wider audience beyond hardcore gamers.
